data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What do you think would be a good business idea? Who do you think would buy your product or service? How would your business be beneficial?
data.answer:
I think a wine business would be a good idea for starting a business. I think the potential consumers of wine would be people from all over the world. My home country, China, has a long history of liquor culture. Now, wine has become one of the mainstreams of liquor when having family or friends for dinner. Similarly, in western culture, wine has been a cultural heritage from predecessors. So, wine's approachable consumers would be very broad.

From the personal side, my business would generate a stable income for me. And from the public's side, wine is a good anti-oxidant made of grapes and is good for health. From the cultural side, my business would be beneficial to the heritage of wine culture. Hence, I consider the wine industry as a good business idea.
